summary.para: Replaces the default text "Cancel" on the common file dialog's Cancel button.

param.name: pszLabel
param.para: Pointer to a string that contains the new text to display on the button.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Changing the text on the Cancel button can be useful for situations where the IFileDialogEvents.OnFileOk method is used to accumulate items, and the button text should be Done instead of Cancel, for example.

summary.para: Specifies a top-level location from which to begin browsing a namespace, for instance in the Save dialog's Browse folder option. Users cannot navigate above this location.

param.name: psi
param.para: Pointer to an object that represents the navigation root.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: SetNavigationRoot can be used by applications that want to restrict navigation to a certain area of the Shell namespace. Items in the navigation pane are replaced with the supplied item, to guide the user from navigating outside of this part of the namespace.
This method cannot be called while the dialog is being displayed.

summary.para: Extends the interface by providing methods that allow the caller to name a specific, restricted location that can be browsed in the common file dialog as well as to specify alternate text to display as a label on the Cancel button.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface, from which it inherits.
An implementation of this interface is provided with Windows. Third parties do not provide custom implementations.
Use the methods of this interface in two instances:

item.description: When you want to restrict the dialog's navigation to a specific namespace.
When you need the dialog's Cancel button to be labeled differently in keeping with your functionality.
